title: Allow contact sensor to reference multiple collision elements

content.raw: Currently a contact sensor returns contact information for a single collision element. Since some users may wish to approximate mesh-based collision elements with groups of simple shapes, it would be convenient to allow the contact sensor to report on multiple collision elements. This would streamline the process using contact sensors while switching between mesh-based collision elements and groups of simple shapes.
content.html: Currently a contact sensor returns contact information for a single collision element. Since some users may wish to approximate mesh-based collision elements with groups of simple shapes, it would be convenient to allow the contact sensor to report on multiple collision elements. This would streamline the process using contact sensors while switching between mesh-based collision elements and groups of simple shapes.
